positions.title: UI/UX Developer
details: Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers
Design user interface elements, such as menus, tabs, and buttons
Prepare and present mockups and prototypes to internal teams and key stakeholders
Identify and troubleshoot UX problems
Manage brand identity and standards across website
